StaFull Favicon SVG Production Bundle

Ramping logic:
- 16 / 32 / 48: minimalist vector (increasing tick detail for legibility).
- 64 / 180 / 512: original detailed gauge embedded as exact-size PNG inside SVG, clipped with matching rounded corners.

Files:
- favicon.svg (authoritative minimalist master)
- favicon-16.svg, favicon-32.svg, favicon-48.svg
- favicon-64.svg, favicon-180.svg, favicon-512.svg
